cyclone.name: IDALIA
cyclone.current_location: about 125 mi south of the western tip of Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: moving north over the Yucatán Channel today, then accelerating north-northeast across the eastern Gulf of Mexico toward Florida’s Big Bend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Big Bend coast (between Aucilla River and Cedar Key)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from Englewood FL to Indian Pass FL; Tropical Storm Watch south of Englewood to Chokoloskee FL
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning for Pinar del Rio, Cuba; Tropical Storm Warning for Yucatán Peninsula Tulum–Rio Lagartos, Isle of Youth, Dry Tortugas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: West coast of Florida, Florida Panhandle east of Pensacola, southeast Georgia and the eastern Carolinas
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty easterly winds 20–30 mph possible Tuesday night into Wednesday; sustained tropical-storm-force winds unlikely
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along Mobile Bay as track remains well east
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–2 inches of outer-band rain showers Tuesday–Wednesday, locally higher in squalls
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated rip-current risk along Alabama beaches through mid-week
